H0.text: Who, more famous for his opera ‘Faust’, wrote the music used for the anthem of the Vatican City. Verdi

H1.text: Who, more famous for his opera ‘Faust’, wrote the music used for the anthem of the Vatican City. Mozart

H2.text: Who, more famous for his opera ‘Faust’, wrote the music used for the anthem of the Vatican City. Puccini

H3.text: Who, more famous for his opera ‘Faust’, wrote the music used for the anthem of the Vatican City. Gounod

A4.text: the Marche pontificale for the anniversary of the coronation of Pius IX (1869), later adopted as the official anthem of the Vatican City
